column5: Daddy daycare meant one thing these last few weeks, spend as much time as possible outside! Kid had a blast playing with a few 2-3 lb fish in the river today, and had a great time walking/working the dog last week(mom was there for that,just for safety). Looks like I'm on the way to creating a future outdoorsmen. Hope everyone else is enjoying the Autumn . PS, Brian (Misfish) the kid left you a few Cheers R
Great pics Ryan.  Did he out fish ya?  Jasper looks ready to go. Good to see.    If he is anything like you,he,ll enjoy his future.   Im out the next 4 days straight.   I just noticed the Grouse.
Awesome.....And i know the feeling my little guy is 2yrs old and he casts out and understands thumbing the baitcaster.. We too are pumped as we have a little outdoors man......and hes loving it !
Not hard to out fish me LOL, Jasper is almost 100% just healing from the big muskrat fight a few days back. Vet will be having a great Christmas this year$$$$$$$$$
My little guy only wants a part of it if there s a fish on the line, dad still has to do all the work LOL

these pics really excite me, perhaps more than a lot of others great reports. My wing man is still only 2 mths away from seeing the "out doors" (ie leaving the womb) and already I can't wait to hear "daddy I think I got one" (even if its a snag)
